bibl.title: Reflections on the Deeds of Sale from the Judaean Desert in Light of Rabbinic Literature.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert
bibl.author: SCHIFFMAN, Lawrence H.

bibl.note: Takes also Greek texts into consideration. - [Introduction.] - 1. The Date. - 2. Place. - 3a. Names of the parties. - 3b. Declaration of sale. - 4. Identification and dimensions of property. - 5. Boundaries. - 6. Description of the property. - 7. Price. - 8. Receipt clause. - 9. Ownership clause. - 10. Responsibility and "cleansing". - 11. Guarantee. - 12. Replacement of the deed. - 13. Signatures. - Conclusion.
SCHIFFMAN Lawrence H., Reflections on the Deeds of Sale from the Judaean Desert in Light of Rabbinic Literature.
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 185-203.
